ResearchTabDef.label: Extra Anomalies
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription:
Expansion of void-related technologies by studying unnatural entities.

It uses logic of anomaly research projects.

Progress shown on Anomaly tab.

ResearchProjectDef.label: modified influenza syringe
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create a syringe containing a modified strain of influenza. The strain will attack the phthoravirus, delaying the next mutation, however it cannot ever reverse a mutation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: synthetic leg
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create a synthetic leg. Placing an ankle monitor on a synthetic leg will pacify it for a couple days.

ResearchProjectDef.label: manmade ankle monitor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to create a manmade ankle monitor. This monitor will deliver the shock faster than the anomalous monitor and will never give a lethal shock.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ankle monitor targetting device
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to spoof the targetting for an ankle monitor. This will allow you to command an ankle monitor to attach to a certain person.
